prime.gui.behaviours.drag.DragHelper

type
class
available in
swf
metadata
:build
'???'
:keep
Instance to help validate if a mouse-down operation is a drag start or not, check if the user released the mousebutton somewhere and check if the user pressed esc to cancel a drag operation. Drag start when: 1. user presses mousebutton down on target 2. user moves mouse cursor at least 3 pixels while holding mousebutton The handler that is given to this class will only be called when the mouse-down event is a valid drag operation.

Constructor

new(target : prime.gui.display.ISprite, startHandler : prime.gui.events.MouseState -> Void, stopHandler : prime.gui.events.MouseState -> Void, cancelHandler : prime.gui.events.MouseState -> Void)
